## Overview

**Slice Type:** Progressive Enhancement
**Priority:** Medium
**Effort:** 12 hours
**Risk:** Low
**Dependencies:** VS-01 (display)

Integrate unit conversion functionality for common measurements.

## User Story

```
As a user
I want to convert between units
So that I can quickly translate measurements
```

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Length conversions (m, ft, in, km, mi)
- [ ] Weight conversions (kg, lb, oz, g)
- [ ] Temperature conversions (C, F, K)
- [ ] Volume conversions (L, gal, ml, oz)
- [ ] Currency conversions (API-based, optional)
- [ ] Quick access from main calculator
- [ ] Bidirectional conversions

## Technical Requirements

**Conversion Functions:**

```javascript
const unitConversions = {
  length: {
    meters: {
      feet: 3.28084,
      inches: 39.3701,
      kilometers: 0.001,
      miles: 0.000621371,
    },
    feet: {
      meters: 0.3048,
      inches: 12,
      kilometers: 0.0003048,
      miles: 0.000189394,
    },
    // ... more conversions
  },
  weight: {
    kilograms: { pounds: 2.20462, ounces: 35.274, grams: 1000 },
    pounds: { kilograms: 0.453592, ounces: 16, grams: 453.592 },
    // ... more conversions
  },
  temperature: {
    celsiusToFahrenheit: (c) => (c * 9) / 5 + 32,
    celsiusToKelvin: (c) => c + 273.15,
    fahrenheitToCelsius: (f) => ((f - 32) * 5) / 9,
    fahrenheitToKelvin: (f) => ((f - 32) * 5) / 9 + 273.15,
    kelvinToCelsius: (k) => k - 273.15,
    kelvinToFahrenheit: (k) => ((k - 273.15) * 9) / 5 + 32,
  },
  volume: {
    liters: { gallons: 0.264172, milliliters: 1000, ounces: 33.814 },
    gallons: { liters: 3.78541, milliliters: 3785.41, ounces: 128 },
    // ... more conversions
  },
};

function convert(value, fromUnit, toUnit, category) {
  if (category === "temperature") {
    const conversionKey = `${fromUnit}To${toUnit}`;
    return unitConversions.temperature[conversionKey](value);
  }

  const rate = unitConversions[category][fromUnit][toUnit];
  return value * rate;
}
```

**UI Components:**

- Conversion mode toggle
- Unit category selector (length, weight, temp, volume)
- From unit selector
- To unit selector
- Convert button
- Result display

## Implementation Checklist

- [ ] Define all conversion rates
- [ ] Implement conversion functions
- [ ] Create unit converter UI
- [ ] Add category selector
- [ ] Add unit selectors
- [ ] Implement bidirectional conversion
- [ ] Style converter UI
- [ ] Write unit tests for all conversions
- [ ] Test edge cases
- [ ] Add unit converter documentation
- [ ] Optional: Add currency API integration
